server.name: io.github.cyanheads/pubmed-mcp-server
server.description: Comprehensive PubMed MCP Server to search, retrieve, and analyze biomedical literature from NCBI.

environmentVariables.description: Specifies the transport mechanism for the server.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_TRANSPORT_TYPE

environmentVariables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').
environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: Your NCBI API key for higher rate limits.
environmentVariables.name: NCBI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Specifies the transport mechanism for the server.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_TRANSPORT_TYPE

environmentVariables.description: The host for the HTTP server.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_HOST

environmentVariables.description: The port for the HTTP server.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_PORT

environmentVariables.description: The endpoint path for MCP requests.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_ENDPOINT_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Your NCBI API key for higher rate limits.
environmentVariables.name: NCBI_API_KEY
